Description: Polls show the far-right Freedom Part of Austria (Freiheitliche Partei Österreich) in the lead, predicted to take more than 28% in what could be their first ever election victory but finding coalition partners could be tough.

Title: Israel strikes central Hezbollah headquarters in Beirut
Description: Local media reports claim that the strike targeted Hezbollah chief Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah.

Title: Renewable energy speculation brewing a storm in Sardinia
Description: The windswept Italian island is a prime location for harvesting the energy of the future. But residents fear poor planning of wind farms and unregulated speculation will turn their homeland into a European Wild West for renewables.

Title: Latvian mural features red cat named Peach
Description: Beloved by local residents in Latvia's capital city of Riga, Peach the cat was created by artist Eriks Caune.

Title: Everywhere, every day': how the EU's drugs agency is tackling a ...
Description: The European Union Drugs Agency is dealing with new challenges to the rule of law as the illegal drugs trade surges.

Title: At least five dead as hurricane Helene rips through southeastern ...
Description: Hurricane Helene has caused havoc across several states after making landfall overnight in northwestern Florida and declared a category 4 storm.

Title: Are the Lebanese people caught in the crossfire of a war they did...
Description: A major humanitarian crisis in Lebanon and the risk of an Israeli ground invasion could overwhelm the country and plunge the region into a total war. What can be done to spare the Lebanese people from a disaster?

Title: Lebanese people fleeing Israeli bombardment face rent-gouging and...
Description: Between overcrowding and impossibly high upfront costs, people displaced by an accelerated war are finding it hard to secure temporary homes.

Title: Belgian PM blasts Pope Francis for Catholic Church's sex abuse co...
Description: Pope Francis applauded at the end of De Croo's damning speech, in which he stressed the need for reparations and justice for the victims of sexual abuse at the hands of church officials.

Title: Nearly 700 killed in Lebanon this week as Israel insists it will ...
Description: Tens of thousands have fled across the border from Lebanon into Syria since the beginning of the week as Israel bombards Hezbollah targets.
